name: March of the Mega-Machines
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the  inevitable

The infinite robot army is here! You are the last line of defense against this overwhelming force. The only thing we can do is hold them off as long as we can.

Use our last resources to construct towers along the enemy's path towards our base. Whenever you destroy an enemy you gain more resources. Construct more towers or upgrade them with the resources.

Controls:

Select: Left mouse button

Deselect: Right mouse button

Pause: Esc / Ctrl / Top-right button
